name: NeonConnect
description:
Description

NeonConnect is simple game of tic tac toe in which you control your character. Your goal is to connect 3, but you can also steal your opponents position.

Features
  • 1-2 Players
  • Simple and robust game play
  • Configurable map size
  • Configurable amount of players
  • Configurable difficulty level
Controls
  • Player 1
    • w,a,s,d
  • Player 2
    • Arrows
  • Menu
    • Enter - confirm
    • Escape - go back (or quit if you are in menu)
